sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: This action calculates the duration between a given start date and end date based on a specified schedule and time zone. It returns the duration broken down into days, hours, minutes, and seconds, along with the total duration in seconds.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Duration calculator
